form.label: Diego Cells

input.label: Choose JVM Description
input.populatingSearch: index=main sourcetype=jmx | dedup jvmDescription | table jvmDescription

form.searchTemplate: index=main sourcetype=jmx host="*" jvmDescription mbean_domain="org.cloudfoundry" mbean_property_deployment="cf" mbean_property_job="diego_cell-*" | eval job_and_index = jvmDescription + "_" + mbean_property_job + "_" + mbean_property_index + "_" + mbean_property_ip | fields job_and_index opentsdb.nozzle.rep.UnhealthyCell

search.query: timechart avg(opentsdb.nozzle.rep.UnhealthyCell) as "Unhealthy Cells" by job_and_index

single.title: The time taken by converger to converge towards Actual LRPs according to Desired LRPS (Normally the sync time should be very low. if the time is high, it means there is something wrong in Diego convergers)

search.query: index=main sourcetype=jmx host="*" opentsdb.nozzle.bbs.ConvergenceLRPDuration=* jvmDescription mbean_domain="org.cloudfoundry" mbean_property_deployment="cf" mbean_property_job=* | eval job_and_index = jvmDescription + "_" + mbean_property_job + "_" + mbean_property_index + "_" + mbean_property_ip | stats max(opentsdb.nozzle.bbs.ConvergenceLRPDuration) as duration | eval duration_in_ms = duration / 1000000 | fields duration_in_ms

single.title: The max time taken by auctioneers to fetch cell state (if the value is high, it means there is something wrong between cells and auctioneers)

search.query: index=main sourcetype=jmx host="*" opentsdb.nozzle.auctioneer.AuctioneerFetchStatesDuration=* jvmDescription mbean_domain="org.cloudfoundry" mbean_property_deployment="cf" mbean_property_job=* | eval job_and_index = jvmDescription + "_" + mbean_property_job + "_" + mbean_property_index + "_" + mbean_property_ip | stats max(opentsdb.nozzle.auctioneer.AuctioneerFetchStatesDuration) as duration | eval duration_in_ms = duration / 1000000 | fields duration_in_ms

chart.title: The total count that Diego auctioneers auction Long Running Process within one hour (it tells us the auctioneers throughput)

search.query: index=main sourcetype=jmx host="*" opentsdb.nozzle.auctioneer.AuctioneerLRPAuctionsStarted=* jvmDescription mbean_domain="org.cloudfoundry" mbean_property_deployment="cf" mbean_property_job=* | eval job_and_index = jvmDescription + "_" + mbean_property_job + "_" + mbean_property_index + "_" + mbean_property_ip | timechart span=1h avg(opentsdb.nozzle.auctioneer.AuctioneerLRPAuctionsStarted) as "Avg LRP Auctions Started"

chart.title: The failure count that Diego auctioneers auction Long Running Process within one minute (Normally the failure time should be 0. if the value is larger than 0, it means there is something wrong in Diego auctioneers)

search.query: index=main sourcetype=jmx host="*" opentsdb.nozzle.auctioneer.AuctioneerLRPAuctionsFailed=* jvmDescription mbean_domain="org.cloudfoundry" mbean_property_deployment="cf" mbean_property_job=* | eval job_and_index = jvmDescription + "_" + mbean_property_job + "_" + mbean_property_index + "_" + mbean_property_ip | timechart span=1m avg(opentsdb.nozzle.auctioneer.AuctioneerLRPAuctionsFailed) as "LRP Auction Failures"

single.title: The time taken by router emitter to sync routes of ActualLRPs to routers (Normally the sync time should be very low. if the time is high, it means there is something wrong between diego and routers)

search.query: index=main sourcetype=jmx host="*" opentsdb.nozzle.route_emitter.RouteEmitterSyncDuration=* jvmDescription mbean_domain="org.cloudfoundry" mbean_property_deployment="cf" mbean_property_job=* | eval job_and_index = jvmDescription + "_" + mbean_property_job + "_" + mbean_property_index + "_" + mbean_property_ip | stats max(opentsdb.nozzle.route_emitter.RouteEmitterSyncDuration) as duration | eval duration_in_ms = duration / 1000000 | fields duration_in_ms

single.title: The time taken by rep to sync its data to ETCD database (Normally the sync time should be very low. if the time is high, it means there is something wrong between cell/rep and ETCD database.)

search.query: index=main sourcetype=jmx host="*" opentsdb.nozzle.rep.RepBulkSyncDuration=* jvmDescription mbean_domain="org.cloudfoundry" mbean_property_deployment="cf" mbean_property_job=* | eval job_and_index = jvmDescription + "_" + mbean_property_job + "_" + mbean_property_index + "_" + mbean_property_ip | stats max(opentsdb.nozzle.rep.RepBulkSyncDuration) as duration | eval duration_in_ms = duration / 1000000 | fields duration_in_ms

single.title: The time taken by NSYNC to get all its values synced (Normally the sync time should be very low. if the time is high, it means there is something wrong between Cloud Controller and Diego components)

search.query: index=main sourcetype=jmx host="*" opentsdb.nozzle.nsync_bulker.DesiredLRPSyncDuration=* jvmDescription mbean_domain="org.cloudfoundry" mbean_property_deployment="cf" mbean_property_job=* | eval job_and_index = jvmDescription + "_" + mbean_property_job + "_" + mbean_property_index + "_" + mbean_property_ip | stats max(opentsdb.nozzle.nsync_bulker.DesiredLRPSyncDuration) as duration | eval duration_in_ms = duration / 1000000 | fields duration_in_ms
